agents.impl.sockets

Class SocketClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.MetaAgent
      • agents.impl.sockets.SocketAgent
        • agents.impl.sockets.SocketClient

  • public class SocketClient
extends SocketAgent
    A socket client that employs a regular Socket to communicate to a SocketServer. This SocketClient contains the underlying connection from the viewpoint of client; whilst the viewpoint of the server is stored elsewhere.
    See Also:
    SocketServer

    • Method Detail

      • threadRun

        protected void threadRun()
        Description copied from class: MetaAgent
        Runs the logic that would usually happen within the running of the anonymous backing thread. This is to allow for overriding within child classes should the need arise for changing the running operation of the agent.
        Overrides:
        threadRun in class MetaAgent
